summary: My wife turned me into a follower
descriptionHtml:
Just another follower mod my wife made. Not sure if it even works. But i promised her i would put it on here. This is just for fun, if you dont like it, dont download it, simples...
HE IS AT DRAGONREACH WHITERUN

Mods used, but unsure if you actually need them
Better males http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3672/?   She used the nude part to give me back my doodle....since cancer took it away in real life.


We kept the hair vanilla.
author: Unspacey and Gamergirl63
